channel.title: Modify Watches: Popular Products
channel.description: A list of the popular products at Modify Watches.

item.title: Ultimate ModiDads Collection (11-Pieces)
item.description:
Save $75... yes SEVENTY-FIVE DOLLARS (!) on this 11-piece set perfect for Dad! Faces: Argyle, Stripe, Silver, Black & Gold. Straps: Slate Grey, White, Brown, Sky Blue & Green. Also includes the staple "ugly tie" for pops!

Price: $145.00
